name: approve
body: ctx . accounts . app . status = RegistrationStatus :: Approved ;
ctx . accounts . app . updated_at = Clock :: get () ? . unix_timestamp ;

name: reject
body: ctx . accounts . app . status = RegistrationStatus :: Rejected ;
ctx . accounts . app . updated_at = Clock :: get () ? . unix_timestamp ;

name: reset
body: ctx . accounts . app . status = RegistrationStatus :: Pending ;
ctx . accounts . app . updated_at = Clock :: get () ? . unix_timestamp ;

fields.name: app
fields.attribute: # [account (init_if_needed , payer = moderator , space = 8 + ApprovalState :: LEN , seeds = [b"approval" , moderator . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]
